attributes.action: birth and death certificates for all stillborn babies  from 12 weeks to 34 weeks
attributes.additional_details: for all stillborn babies to be given a proper birth and a death certificate from 12 weeks gestation to 34 weeks.  and ban the entry of stillbirth certificates the home office says the entry of stillbirth uses that certificate for statistics on  babys that have been born dead. they can still have the statistics if they gave the birth and death certificate the death certificate can state the baby  was born dead and the birth certificates can state the baby was born  and the name of the child and all the normal details for a baby born.
